mapper.insert: INSERT INTO server_info (server_os, server_hostname, memory_total, purpose, server_ip) VALUES (#{serverOs}, #{serverHostname}, #{memoryTotal}, #{purpose}, #{serverIp});
mapper.update: UPDATE server_info SET server_os = CASE WHEN #{serverOs} IS NOT NULL THEN #{serverOs} ELSE server_os END, server_hostname = CASE WHEN #{serverHostname} IS NOT NULL THEN #{serverHostname} ELSE server_hostname END, memory_total = CASE WHEN #{memoryTotal} IS NOT NULL THEN #{memoryTotal} ELSE memory_total END, purpose = CASE WHEN #{purpose} IS NOT NULL THEN #{purpose} ELSE purpose END, server_ip = CASE WHEN #{serverIp} IS NOT NULL THEN #{serverIp} ELSE server_ip END WHERE server_id=#{serverId};
